neuralSystem.title: How We Think, How We Teach
neuralSystem.description: We revolutionize the way you learn. At GArts Education, we study exactly how the human brain learns, adapts, and evolves - and we design our teaching around that. Every connection, every feedback loop, every challenge is built to train not just your hands, but your mind. The more you learn how you think, the better you create.

blender.title: Blender
blender.description:
Blender is an open source software that enables you to create 3D models with high fidelity and simulate entire worlds approximating those of real life thanks to Cycles one of the best photorealistic rendering engines that exist in the 3D industry.

The various tools that are available offer endless possibilities to reach the desired outcome and speed up your workflow producing results with high efficiency.

With frequent updates and new features Blender undoubtfully wins the competition of the best 3D software since it delivers to you the most complete package either you want to become a 3D modeler or an animator and most importantly for free.

photoshop.title: Photoshop
photoshop.description:
Photoshop is an image editing software owned by Adobe used by thousands of photographers and CGI artists all around the world. Its powerful layering system gives to the user the possibility to work undestructively performing adjustments and effects without altering the initial result.

Not only it can transform entirely an otherwise bad looking image, but also it can be used in conjunction with Blender to create complicated texture maps and apply minute details to every 3D model.

With the help of Photoshop you can boost your career as a graphic designer or photographer, since mastering its tools gives you access to more sophisticated ways of manipulating images, enchaning the emotions conveyed in a picture or the realism of a 3D scene.

premierePro.title: Premiere Pro
premierePro.description:
Premiere Pro the industry leader in the video editing software, gives you the power to control the flow of your videos, telling the most incredible story by sequencing and editing them, in order to deliver to the viewer a seamless experience.

With track mattes you can control the area which each video is visible, thus combining them with the best possible way.

The timeline will become your best friend, since you can define precisely the exact moment each clip succeeds the previous one and whether or not a transition will be performed for a smooth blending.

Sound effects can be added on top of each clip to enhance the impression of a lively environment, as well as color grading features which give to the overall result a more atmospheric look and reflect the mood of the location and time period that the facts of the story take place.

afterEffects.title: After Effects
afterEffects.description:
After Effects is designed for all those you want to spice up their video content with amazing visual effects and motion graphics.

Used in many post-production scenes for movies and advertisements, equips the artist with some of the most powerful tools for tracking and keying in order to composite real-time footage with 3d objects.

Countless plugins as well as collaborative operation with Premiere Pro and other Adobe software, expand the functionality of the program and speed up the process of building up complicated compositions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Learn more about our team and mission

content.paragraph1: Since my early childhood i was captivated by the visuals of the movie and video game industry. It was the age where all the big blockbuster movies which blended seamlessly reality with computer generated graphics were released for the first time.
content.paragraph2: Since i graduated from the university of economics and business, i realized that if someone wants to have a successful career and live a fulfilled life should always chase his/her dreams after.
content.paragraph3: And guess what.. mine was not about submitting financial reports but using a mix of my imagination and skills in computer graphics that i should develop, to quench my thirst of conveying whatever crazy ideas that i could came up with, into a screen made of pixels.
content.paragraph4: Thus, fueled by passion after years of hard work i have managed to acquire all the necessary knowledge in order to turn my dream into reality, delivering high quality visuals to people which i am truly proud of. All of a sudden, this gave meaning to an otherwise boring and mundane daily routine that i was repeating the same tasks again and again.
content.paragraph5: And this is the purpose of this site.. to share all this wealth of knowledge with you, interact with each other exchanging opinions and perspectives on how something could be improved, investing your time into something that you truly love and you are enthusiastic about, where you will always have something new and exciting to learn, challenging yourselves every day to become better.
content.paragraph6: And one day who knows you may conquer a place amongst the top artist of the world.

vision.title: My Vision
vision.content: To empower aspiring artists and creators with the tools, knowledge, and inspiration they need to transform their imagination into stunning visual realities. Through comprehensive education in computer graphics and digital arts, I aim to build a community where creativity knows no bounds, and every student discovers their unique artistic voice in the ever-evolving world of digital media.

3dModeling.title: 3D Modeling
3dModeling.description: Master the fundamentals of creating 3D objects and structures. Learn to build everything from simple shapes to complex models using industry-standard techniques and workflows.

digitalSculpting.title: Digital Sculpting
digitalSculpting.description: Discover the art of organic modeling through digital sculpting. Create detailed characters, creatures, and natural forms with intuitive sculpting tools and techniques.

uvMapping.title: UV Mapping
uvMapping.description: Learn how to unwrap 3D models and create efficient UV layouts. Essential skill for applying textures and materials to your 3D creations with precision.

texturing.title: Texturing
texturing.description: Bring your models to life with realistic textures and surface details. Master procedural and image-based texturing techniques for photorealistic results.

shading.title: Shading
shading.description: Understand material properties and shader networks. Learn to create realistic materials that respond accurately to light, from metals to glass to skin.

animationPrinciples.title: Animation Principles
animationPrinciples.description: Explore the 12 principles of animation and bring your creations to life. Learn timing, spacing, and movement to create compelling character and object animations.

rendering.title: Rendering
rendering.description: Master the art of rendering photorealistic images. Learn lighting techniques, render settings, and optimization strategies for stunning final outputs.

videoEditing.title: Video Editing
videoEditing.description: Edit and sequence your animations and footage. Learn professional video editing workflows, transitions, and storytelling techniques.

postProcessing.title: Post Processing
postProcessing.description: Enhance your renders with compositing and color grading. Add visual effects, adjust colors, and polish your work to professional standards.

fileExploring.title: File Exploring
fileExploring.description: Understand file formats, project organization, and asset management. Learn best practices for managing complex projects and collaborating with teams.

vertex.title: Vertex
vertex.description: A single point in 3D space - the most basic building block of any 3D model

edge.title: Edge
edge.description: A line connecting two vertices, forming the skeleton of your model

face.title: Face
face.description: A surface created by connecting edges, giving your model its shape

mesh.title: Mesh
mesh.description: The complete 3D model formed by combining faces into a complex structure
